laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).
Demonstrated a right lower quadrant collection with small areas of gas locules, measuring 4.5 x 3.5 cm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Final CT scan of the pelvis shows decreased size of the collection compared to the initial scan.
